sentence.Network_en: He finally corrected his misstatement and offered to reduce the fee.
sentence.Network_cn: 他终于纠正了自己的错误说法，提出要减少费用。

sentence.Network_en: I wish to correct my earlier misstatement.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想更正我先前的不实之词.

sentence.Network_en: Trouble is , he's made the same misstatement at least 10 times before.
sentence.Network_cn: 他也许会辩解说这只是口误, 但问题是此前他已经出现至少10次同样的口误.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...念公告第2号中这样描述重要性概念：“一项会计信息的错报（misstatement）或漏报（omission）是重要的，指在特定环境下，一个 …
勤审计质量的评价,进而影响到市场对其审计的其他上市公司财务报表的评价,也即原由中天勤审计的上市公司其财务报告往往被认为缺乏可信度并且被误述(misstatement)的可能.

entry.tran: 错误的陈述;虚假的报道;谎报
entry.def: A misstatement is an incorrect statement, or the giving of false information.

example.ex: He finally corrected his misstatement and offered to reduce the fee...
example.tran: 他终于纠正了自己的错误说法，提出要减少费用。

example.ex: While this booklet has become an official source of information, it is filled with misstatements of fact.
example.tran: 尽管这本小册子已经成为正式的信息来源，里面仍然错误百出。

means.word_mean: 1. a statement that contains a mistake

auth_sentence.content: To say the world is functioning fine is a bit of a misstatement.
auth_sentence.res_content: To say the world is functioning fine is a bit of a misstatement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To say the world is functioning fine is a bit of a misstatement.

auth_sentence.content: It was a searing misstatement for the Arizona senator who'd never seemed comfortable discussing the economy.
